upload.tip: Drag and drop your image here or click to upload

how-to-use.title: How to use?
how-to-use.p1: Drap and drop an image file, the app will read 2 majar color of the image then set the background color automatically.
how-to-use.p2: You can click the download button to download the background image file.
how-to-use.p3: Also can click to copy the corresponding html code.

message.process-error: Can't process, refresh then try again.
